q1: Is Argentina a better team with or without Messi?
a1: Messi of course adds a lot to the team.
q2: I think they are better with Messi gone.
a2: it would be better with messi, but I think without, it will also be good
q3: Lionel Messi is the best player in the world
a3: No, Cristiano Ronaldo is the best player in the world
q4: What team does Cristiano Ronaldo play for?
a4: Ronaldo plays for Juventas and Portugal.
